title: What to Say When Someone Asks “How Old Do You Think I Am?”

steps.title: Throw out a witty one-liner to make the other person laugh.
steps.content: Throw out a witty one-liner to make the other person laugh . If you want to tease someone and lighten the mood, crack a joke about how young they are. Studies show that sharing a laugh together can strengthen your relationship. [1] X Trustworthy Source Greater Good Magazine Journal published by UC Berkeley's Greater Good Science Center, which uses scientific research to promote happier living Go to source So, reply in a silly way to relieve any tension and avoid offending the other person. 👶 < you < 👵 In dog years or cat years? Younger than my grandma. Somewhere between 0 and 40. How much will you pay me for answering? A year older than the age you were last year. Older than a newborn but younger than Gandhi. Age doesn’t matter unless you’re cheese or wine. Based on your energy levels, I’d guess 10 years old. I think you’re younger than the sun, but older than any cloud in the sky. I’m not sure how old you are, but I’m old enough to know not to answer that question 🤣

steps.title: Ask a creative question to get a better idea of how old they are.
steps.content: Ask a creative question to get a better idea of how old they are. Even if you’re confident about someone’s age, it’s always a safe bet to learn more about them first. Ask the other person about their hobbies, interests, and memories as a child, or when they graduated school. It’s a great opportunity to ballpark their age, get to know them better , and kickstart a lively conversation ! What was the model of your first phone? What was the first concert you attended? What kind of games did you play growing up? What was your favorite book series as a child? When did you graduate from high school or college? What was your favorite movie or TV show as a child? Do you know what a pager/walkman/VHS/floppy disk is? What was the biggest boy band when you were in school? What was a huge fashion trend when you were in middle school? What historical event had the biggest impact on you during school?

steps.title: Hit back with a flirty reply to make the other person feel desired.
steps.content: Hit back with a flirty reply to make the other person feel desired. Trying to snag a date or take your relationship to the next level? Use any of the following responses to show interest and make the other person feel special . If you’re worried they might take it the wrong way, flash a smile or wink when you deliver your line, or send a flirty emoji to accompany your text. Not old at all. In your prime. Around my age. Grown and sexy. Younger than me. I think you’re timeless. The perfect age for me. Who cares? You’re a dime! You’re cute, sexy, and gorgeous years old. I’m not big on guessing games, but I’d say twenty-fine. You look like a student, but you seem wiser too. Can you give me a clue? 😉

steps.title: Respond in a short and straightforward way if you don’t know what to say.
steps.content: Respond in a short and straightforward way if you don’t know what to say. When in doubt, don’t throw a number out! In America, it’s considered rude to ask a woman her age, and you could offend her if you guess older. [2] X Research source If your relationship is strictly platonic, stick with the following lines to be respectful : Why do you ask? Honestly, I can’t tell. Sorry, I have no idea. I’ve learned not to answer this question 😂 Respectfully, I’m going to pass on your question. No offense, but I don’t think I know you well enough. Wow, you’re really putting me on the spot right now 😅 I’m not sure, but I’m really bad at guessing other people’s ages.
